duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify prospective candidates through job board search tools, referrals, and professional networking.
Interview and qualify job seekers for temporary/contract roles with client companies.
Prep candidates for interviews with client companies, providing resume tips and conducting mock interviews.
Contact candidates post-interview, provide feedback, and manage the offer process for candidates.
Manage and maintain relationships with job seekers, offering career coaching and support throughout the job search process.
Meet with the team to discuss open positions and post job advertisements on job boards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Human Resources, or related field (Master's preferred)
